8 FnF::FnF()
9 {
10  datagot_ = false;
11  following_ = false;
12  insight_ = false;
13  running = true;
14  moving_ = false;
15  searching_ = true;
16  diameter = 0.46;
17  //interrupt_ = false;
18  start();
19 }
20 
21 void FnF::start()
22 {
23  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnF::search,this));
24  threads_.push_back(std::thread(&FnF::following,this));
25 }
26 
27 FnF::~FnF()
28 {
29  running = false;
30  //Join threads
31  for(auto &t: threads_)
32  {
33  t.join();
34  }
35 }

191 
192 void FnF::following()
193 {
194  FnFData data;
195  geometry_msgs::PoseArray poses;
196  geometry_msgs::Pose current;
197  geometry_msgs::Pose current1;
198  geometry_msgs::Point goal;
199  double na;
200  ros::Rate rate_limiter(1.0/1.0);
201  while(ros::ok())
202  {
203  std::unique_lock<std::mutex> lck(Followmtx_);
204  Followcv_.wait(lck,[&](){return following_ == true;});
205  lck.unlock();
206 
207  mtx_.lock();
208  data = data_;
209  current = data_.pose0;
210  current1 = data_.pose1;
211  mtx_.unlock();
212  geometry_msgs::Pose temp;
213  temp.position = current1.position;
214  goal = getpointaroundR1(current.position,temp.position);
215 
216 
217  double yaw = atan2((temp.position.y-current.position.y),(temp.position.x-current.position.x));
218  if(yaw<0){yaw = yaw + 2*M_PI;}
219  YawtoQuat(yaw,temp);
220  temp.position = goal;
221 
222  Pathpacket packet = {current,current1,temp};
223  double dist_t_r1 = pow(pow((current1.position.y-current.position.y),2) + pow((current1.position.x - current.position.x),2),0.5);
224  if(dist_t_r1>1.25) //if too close dont do anything
225  {
226  ROS_INFO_STREAM("FOLLOWING!");
227  geometry_msgs::PoseArray array = getpath(packet);
228  publishPose(array);
229  ROS_INFO_STREAM("GOAL REACHED!");
230  mtx_.lock();
231  data = data_;
232  current = data_.pose0;
233  current1 = data_.pose1;
234  mtx_.unlock();
235 
236  yaw = atan2((current1.position.y-current.position.y),(current1.position.x-current.position.x));
237  if(yaw<0){yaw = yaw + 2*M_PI;}
238  YawtoQuat(yaw,temp);
239 
240  temp.position = current.position;
241  geometry_msgs::PoseArray tempa;
242  tempa.poses = {temp};
243  publishPose(tempa);
244  }
245  if(dist_t_r1<1.25)
246  {
247  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Too close! Remaining still. Can I help you?");
248  rate_limiter.sleep();
249  }
250  }
251 }
